Structure# CFRunLoopMode

iOSiPadOSMac CatalystmacOStvOSvisionOSwatchOS

```
struct CFRunLoopMode
```

## [Topics](/documentation/CoreFoundation/CFRunLoopMode#topics)

### [Type Properties](/documentation/CoreFoundation/CFRunLoopMode#Type-Properties)

[`static let commonModes: CFRunLoopMode!`](/documentation/corefoundation/cfrunloopmode/commonmodes)Objects added to a run loop using this value as the mode are monitored by all run loop modes that have been declared as a member of the set of “common” modes with [`CFRunLoopAddCommonMode(_:_:)`](/documentation/corefoundation/cfrunloopaddcommonmode(_:_:)).[`static let defaultMode: CFRunLoopMode!`](/documentation/corefoundation/cfrunloopmode/defaultmode)Run loop mode that should be used when a thread is in its default, or idle, state, waiting for an event. This mode is used when the run loop is started with [`CFRunLoopRun()`](/documentation/corefoundation/cfrunlooprun()).### [Initializers](/documentation/CoreFoundation/CFRunLoopMode#Initializers)
